select * from
(select distinct hd.HOADON_ID, hd.SOHOADON, hd.NGAYHOADON, httt.GIATRITHUCTHU, bn.TENBENHNHAN, bn.MAYTE, bn.DIACHILIENLAC DIACHI, case when hdngt.HOADON_ID is not null then N'Ngoại trú/ nhà thuốc' else N'Nội trú' end LOAIHOADONTHU, case when hdngt.HOADON_ID is not null then N'TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU' else N'TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NOITRU' end REF_TABLE, nv.TENNHANVIEN, httt.TENHINHTHUCTHANHTOAN, 'BENHVIEN' THANHTOANTAI from TT_HOADON hd left join TT_HOADON_HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN httt on httt.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TT_BENHNHAN bn on bn.BENHNHAN_ID = hd.BENHNHAN_ID left join TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU hdngt on hdngt.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NOITRU hdnt on hdnt.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TM_NHANVIEN nv on nv.NHANVIEN_ID = hd.NGUOITAO_ID left join TT_EINVOICE_HOADON vnpt on vnpt.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TT_EINVOICE main on main.EINVOICE_ID = vnpt.EINVOICE_ID where (hd.TIEPNHAN_ID is not null or hd.BENHNHAN_ID is not null ) and hd.LOAIHOADON = 'BL' and (vnpt.HOADON_ID is null) and hd.DATHANHTOAN = '1' and hd.HUYHOADON = '0' and hd.HOANTRA = '0'
convert(date, hd.NGAYHOADON) >= convert(date, '$TUNGAY$')
convert(date, hd.NGAYHOADON) <= convert(date, '$DENNGAY$')
(bn.TENBENHNHAN like '%' + #TENBENHNHAN# + '%' or bn.MAYTE like '%' + #TENBENHNHAN# + '%')
union all select distinct hd.HOADON_ID, hd.SOHOADON, hd.NGAYHOADON, httt.GIATRITHUCTHU, NM.TENNGUOIMUA TENBENHNHAN, ('VANGLAI' + cast(NM.NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA_ID as varchar(10))) MAYTE, NM.DIACHI, N'Vãng lai nhà thuốc' LOAIHOADONTHU, N'TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU' REF_TABLE, nv.TENNHANVIEN, httt.TENHINHTHUCTHANHTOAN, 'VANGLAI' THANHTOANTAI from TT_HOADON hd left join TT_HOADON_HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN httt on httt.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU hdngt on hdngt.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU_CHITIET ctct on ctct.CHUNGTUCHITIET_ID= hdngt.REF_ID left join TT_DUOC_CHUNGTU ct on ct.CHUNGTU_ID = ctct.CHUNGTU_ID left join TT_NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA NM on NM.NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA_ID = CT.NGOAITRU_TOATHUOC_NGUOIMUA_ID left join TM_NHANVIEN nv on nv.NHANVIEN_ID = hd.NGUOITAO_ID left join TT_EINVOICE_HOADON vnpt on vnpt.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TT_EINVOICE main on main.EINVOICE_ID = vnpt.EINVOICE_ID where hd.TIEPNHAN_ID is null and hd.BENHNHAN_ID is null and hd.LOAIHOADON = 'BL' and (vnpt.HOADON_ID is null) and hd.DATHANHTOAN = '1' and hd.HUYHOADON = '0' and hd.HOANTRA = '0'
convert(date, hd.NGAYHOADON) >= convert(date, '$TUNGAY$')
convert(date, hd.NGAYHOADON) <= convert(date, '$DENNGAY$')
(NM.TENNGUOIMUA like '%' + #TENBENHNHAN# + '%')
) ds order by ds.TENBENHNHAN

select * from TT_EINVOICE hd where HUY = '0'
convert(date, hd.NGAYPHATSINH) >= convert(date, '$TUNGAY$')
convert(date, hd.NGAYPHATSINH) <= convert(date, '$DENNGAY$')
(hd.BUYER like '%' + #TENBENHNHAN# + '%' or hd.CUSCODE like '%' + #TENBENHNHAN# + '%')

select distinct hdct.*, hdct.GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN AMOUNT, hdct.SOLUONG PRODQUANTITY, isnull(dv.TENDICHVU, dc.TENDUOCDAYDU) PRODNAME from $REF_TABLE$ hdct left join TM_DICHVU dv on dv.DICHVU_ID = hdct.DICHVU_ID and hdct.DUOC_ID is null left join TM_DUOC dc on dc.DUOC_ID = hdct.DUOC_ID and hdct.DICHVU_ID is null where HOADON_ID = $HOADON_ID$
select B.* from TT_EINVOICE A left join TT_EINVOICE_HOADON B on A.EINVOICE_ID = B.EINVOICE_ID where B.HOADON_ID = $HOADON_ID$ and A.HUY = '0'
select A.* from TT_EINVOICE A where A.KEYINVOICE = '$KEYINVOICE$' and A.HUY = '0'
select B.* from TT_EINVOICE A left join TT_EINVOICE_HOADON B on A.EINVOICE_ID = B.EINVOICE_ID where B.HOADON_ID in ($KHG_LST_HOADON_ID$) and A.HUY = '0'

select distinct hdct.HOADON_ID,hdct.GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN AMOUNT, hdct.SOLUONG PRODQUANTITY, isnull(dv.TENDICHVU, dc.TENDUOCDAYDU) PRODNAME from TT_HOADON hd inner join TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NGOAITRU hdct on hdct.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TM_DICHVU dv on dv.DICHVU_ID = hdct.DICHVU_ID and hdct.DUOC_ID is null left join TM_DUOC dc on dc.DUOC_ID = hdct.DUOC_ID and hdct.DICHVU_ID is null where hd.HOADON_ID in ($KHG_LST_HOADON_ID$) and hd.DATHANHTOAN = '1' and hd.HUYHOADON = '0' and hd.HOANTRA = '0' union all select distinct hdct.HOADON_ID,hdct.GIATRI_BENHNHAN_DATHANHTOAN AMOUNT, hdct.SOLUONG PRODQUANTITY, isnull(dv.TENDICHVU, dc.TENDUOCDAYDU) PRODNAME from TT_HOADON hd inner join TT_HOADON_CHITIET_NOITRU hdct on hdct.HOADON_ID = hd.HOADON_ID left join TM_DICHVU dv on dv.DICHVU_ID = hdct.DICHVU_ID and hdct.DUOC_ID is null left join TM_DUOC dc on dc.DUOC_ID = hdct.DUOC_ID and hdct.DICHVU_ID is null where hd.HOADON_ID in ($KHG_LST_HOADON_ID$) and hd.DATHANHTOAN = '1' and hd.HUYHOADON = '0' and hd.HOANTRA = '0'

declare @jsonVNPT nvarchar(max); declare @jsonHODON_IDVNPT nvarchar(max); set @jsonVNPT = N'$JSON_DATA$'; set @jsonHODON_IDVNPT = N'$JSON_DATA_HOADON$';
declare @EINVOICE_ID int; INSERT INTO TT_EINVOICE (KEYINVOICE ,BUYER, [ADDRESS], CUSCODE ,CUSNAME ,PAYMENTMETHOD ,NGAYPHATSINH ,SOHOADON ,GIATRITHUCTHU ,SOTIENBANGCHU , HUY, NGUOITAO_ID, NGAYTAO, BENHVIEN_ID) VALUES (#KEYINVOICE#, #BUYER#, #ADDRESS#, #CUSCODE#, #CUSNAME#, #PAYMENTMETHOD#, #NGAYPHATSINH#, #SOHOADON#, #GIATRITHUCTHU#, #SOTIENBANGCHU# ,'0', '$USER_HOADON$', Getdate(), '$BENHVIEN_ID$') set @EINVOICE_ID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()
insert into TT_EINVOICE_HOADON SELECT @EINVOICE_ID, jsonHD.HOADON_ID, '$BENHVIEN_ID$' FROM OPENJSON(@jsonHODON_IDVNPT) WITH ( HOADON_ID int) jsonHD
insert into TT_EINVOICE_DETAIL SELECT @EINVOICE_ID, json.HOADON_ID, json.PRODNAME, json.PRODQUANTITY, json.PRODUNIT, json.AMOUNT, '$USER_HOADON$', getdate() , '$BENHVIEN_ID$' FROM OPENJSON(@jsonVNPT) WITH ( HOADON_ID int, PRODNAME nvarchar(300), PRODQUANTITY float, PRODUNIT nvarchar(100), AMOUNT float) json

insert into TT_EINVOICE_HUY select * from TT_EINVOICE where KEYINVOICE = '$KEYINVOICE$'
update TT_EINVOICE_HUY set HUY = '1', NGAYHUY = getdate(), NGUOIHUY_ID = '$USER_HOADON$' where KEYINVOICE = '$KEYINVOICE$'
delete from TT_EINVOICE where KEYINVOICE = '$KEYINVOICE$'
